title: Grilled Cheese With Bacon And Arugula
summary: You can never have too many main course recipes, so give Grilled Cheese With Bacon And Arugulan a try. This recipe makes 2 servings with 767 calories, 27g of protein, and 28g of fat each. For $2.43 per serving, this recipe covers 28% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. A mixture of baby arugula, bacon, crusty sandwich bread, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so delicious. To use up the butter you could follow this main course with the Cinnamon Butter Cake as a dessert. It is perfect for The Fourth Of July. This recipe is liked by 4 foodies and cooks. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 71%, this dish is solid. Similar recipes include Grilled Cheese With Tomato, Avocado, Bacon, And Arugula, Grilled Fig, Bacon, and Arugula Flatbread Pizza, and Grilled Jarlsberg with Shaved Asparagus and Arugula Pesto + Grilled Cheese Kit Giveaway!.
